content: Session Lifetime allows to set time (in minutes) before the {{productName}} users will need to enter the space credentials again in order to access the space.

comment.text: "Defines the session lifetime duration message to be displayed to mobile users, explaining how long their access credentials are valid before needing re-entry."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'enter the space credentials again' is not accurately reflected in the Arabic translation. 'Credentials' implies username and password, but the Arabic uses the word 'الرموز' (al-rumooz) which translates to 'symbols' or 'codes.' This is ambiguous and less precise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يسمح لك خيار تحديد مدة الجلسة لتحديد الوقت (بالدقيقة) قبل أن يحتاج مستخدمي {{productName}} لإدخال اسم المستخدم وكلمة المرور مجدداً من أجل الدخول للمساحة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a major issue, the phrase 'من أجل الدخول للمساحة' could be slightly improved for flow. It's grammatically correct, but could be more elegant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يسمح لك خيار تحديد مدة الجلسة لتحديد الوقت (بالدقيقة) قبل أن يحتاج مستخدمي {{productName}} لإدخال اسم المستخدم وكلمة المرور مجدداً للدخول إلى المساحة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "domen məlumatlarını" (domain information) doesn't accurately convey "space credentials." Credentials typically encompass username and password, not just domain information.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sessiya Müddəti sizə {{productName}} istifadəçilərinin sahəyə daxil olmaq üçün təcrübə məlumatlarını (və ya hesab məlumatlarını) yenidən daxil etməli olduğu vaxtın miqdarını (dəqiqələrlə) təyin etməyə imkan verir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English version uses double curly braces '{{productName}}' while the Azerbaijani translation uses single curly braces. Although this may be a platform/rendering issue, consistency is preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the Azerbaijani version uses double curly braces '{{productName}}' to match the English source.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Времето за Продължителност на Сесията' is a bit verbose. A more concise option would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Време за Сесията

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'enter the space credentials again' is a bit awkward. 'Идентификационните данни на пространството' can be improved to be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: потребителските данни за достъп до пространството

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'der Bereich zugreifen zu können' is awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'auf den Bereich zugreifen können'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: auf den Bereich zugreifen können

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Session Lifetime' is translated as 'Η επιλογή Διάρκεια περιόδου λειτουργίας'. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more natural translation might be something like 'Διάρκεια Συνεδρίας' or 'Διάρκεια Ζωής Συνεδρίας'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Διάρκεια Συνεδρίας' or 'Διάρκεια Ζωής Συνεδρίας'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'enter the space credentials' is translated as 'εισάγουν ξανά τα διαπιστευτήρια του χώρου'.  'διαπιστευτήρια του χώρου' is a bit formal. A more common and understandable phrasing would be 'συνδεθούν ξανά' or 'εισάγουν ξανά τα στοιχεία σύνδεσης'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'συνδεθούν ξανά' or 'εισάγουν ξανά τα στοιχεία σύνδεσης'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Spanish translation uses 'La duración de la sesión' which translates to 'The session duration'. It is slightly more literal than the English 'Session Lifetime' which implies a function or feature. Consider a more idiomatic translation like 'Tiempo de sesión' or 'Vida de la sesión' to better reflect the original meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Tiempo de sesión' or 'Vida de la sesión' for a more natural flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrase 'antes de que los usuarios de {{productName}} tengan que volver a introducir las credenciales del espacio para acceder al mismo' is a bit verbose. A more concise option would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising to: 'antes de que los usuarios de {{productName}} tengan que volver a ingresar las credenciales para acceder al espacio.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ennen kuin {{productName}}-n käyttäjien tulee" is awkward and not a natural Finnish construction.  It literally translates to "before {{productName}}-'s users must". It should be rephrased for clarity and flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ennen kuin {{productName}}-käyttäjien on syötettävä

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'tilojen' should be 'tilaan' (into the space) to accurately convey the meaning of accessing the space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: tilaan päästäkseen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit convoluted.  Breaking it up could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Istunnon kesto mahdollistaa ajan (minuuteissa) asetuksen, jonka jälkeen {{productName}}-käyttäjien on syötettävä tilaan kirjautumistiedot päästäkseen tilaan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'մինչև {{productName}}-ի օգտատերերը' is slightly awkward. A more natural flow would be to rephrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: մինչև {{productName}}-ի օգտատերերը նորից մուտքագրեն տարածքի հավատարմագրերը.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'allows to set' is not accurately translated. A more direct translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: մուտքագրելու համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "スペース認証情報を入力するまでの時間" (time until entering space credentials) is a bit clunky and could be more natural. While technically correct, it doesn't flow as smoothly as it could.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: セッションライフタイムでは、{{productName}}ユーザーがスペースにアクセスする際に、再度認証情報を入力するまでの時間（分）を設定できます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "세션 수명을 사용하면" is a bit awkward. A more natural translation for 'Session Lifetime allows' would be something like "세션 수명 설정은" or "세션 수명을 통해".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 세션 수명 설정은

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '공간 자격 증명을 다시 입력해야 하기까지의 시간' is a bit verbose and indirect. A more direct translation for 'enter the space credentials again' would be '공간 로그인 정보' or '공간 접속 정보'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 공간 로그인 정보

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses Lao script which is fine, but the placement of the double curly braces '{{productName}}' needs to be consistent with the English original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure that the placement of '{{productName}}' is identical to the English version, typically at the end of the relevant noun phrase or adjective.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "akreditācijas dati" (credentials) is a bit formal and less common in everyday Latvian. A more natural translation would be "paroles" or "ievades dati". While technically correct, it sounds stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sesijas ilgums ļauj iestatīt laiku (minūtēs), pirms {{productName}} lietotājiem būs atkārtoti jāievada telpas paroles, lai piekļūtu vietai.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "lai piekļūtu vietai" is a little redundant. 'Vietai' can be omitted as the context is already understood.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sesijas ilgums ļauj iestatīt laiku (minūtēs), pirms {{productName}} lietotājiem būs atkārtoti jāievada telpas paroles, lai piekļūtu telpai.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Session Lifetime' is translated as 'Duur van de sessie'. While technically correct, a more natural and common Dutch translation might be 'Sessie Duur' or 'Levensduur van de sessie'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sessie Duur

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'enter the space credentials' is translated as 'inloggegevens moeten invoeren'. A more natural translation would be 'inloggegevens opnieuw moeten invoeren' to explicitly state that it's a re-entry.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: inloggegevens opnieuw moeten invoeren

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The double space after 'ruimte' is unnecessary and should be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ruimte.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'enter the space credentials' is not the most natural way to express logging in again. A more common and understandable phrasing would be 'ponownie zalogować się do obszaru'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Długość sesji pozwala wybrać czas (w minutach), zanim użytkownicy {{productName}} będą musieli ponownie zalogować się do obszaru, aby uzyskać do niego dostęp.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Session Lifetime' is in English within the Portuguese translation. It's better to translate it or consider keeping it in English consistently throughout the product UI.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'Session Lifetime' to 'Tempo de Sessão' or maintaining it in English if that's the standard practice.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'inserir as credenciais do espaço novamente' sounds a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing exists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'revalidar as credenciais do espaço' or 'inserir as credenciais do espaço de novo'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'vor fi nevoiți' is grammatically awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'vor trebui'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: vor trebui

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'datele de autentificare' is slightly awkward. A more natural and common phrase would be 'credințiale'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: credințiale

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'spaţiul' appears twice. Maintaining consistency in capitalization (e.g., using 'spațiul' consistently) improves readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use 'spațiul' consistently throughout the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'для получения доступа к нему' is slightly awkward. 'нему' refers to the space, but the phrasing could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Russian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: для доступа к пространству

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The spacing before 'нему' in 'для получения доступа к нему' isn't ideal for Russian text. It should be closer to the noun.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: для получения доступа к пространству

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'පරිශීලකයින්' (parishilakayin) which translates to 'users' or 'consumers' feels slightly unnatural in this context. A more appropriate term might be 'භාවිතකරුවන්' (bhavitakaruwan) which directly means 'users'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නවතියේ කාලය, {{productName}} භාවිතකරුවන් අවකාශයට ප්‍රවේශ වීම සඳහා නැවත අවකාශයගේ සහතිකපත්ර ඇතුළු කර ගැනීමට අවශ්‍ය කාලය (මිනිත්තු වලින්) සැකසීමට ඉඩ සලසයි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'අවකාශයගේ සහතිකපත්ර' (awasayage sahathikapatra) which translates to 'space credentials' sounds overly formal and awkward. A simpler phrasing such as 'අවකාශයේ ලියාණම්' (awasayede liyana) – 'space logins' would be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නවතියේ කාලය, {{productName}} භාවිතකරුවන් අවකාශයට ප්‍රවේශ වීම සඳහා නැවත අවකාශයේ ලියාණම් ඇතුළු කර ගැනීමට අවශ්‍ය කාලය (මිනිත්තු වලින්) සැකසීමට ඉඩ සලසයි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the passive voice used throughout ('is allowed to set') can sound less direct in Sinhala.  A more active phrasing is generally preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නවතියේ කාලය, {{productName}} භාවිතකරුවන් අවකාශයට ප්‍රවේශ වීම සඳහා නැවත අවකාශයේ ලියාණම් ඇතුළු කර ගැනීමට අවශ්‍ය කාලය (මිනිත්තු වලින්) සැකසීමට හැකිවේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Session Lifetime' is translated as 'Čas trvania relácie'. While technically correct, it's a bit literal and could be improved for natural Slovak. 'Dĺžka relácie' or 'Životnosť relácie' might be more idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Dĺžka relácie' or 'Životnosť relácie' as alternatives to 'Čas trvania relácie'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'enter the space credentials' is translated as 'znovu zadať prihlasovacie údaje do priestoru'. A more natural translation might focus on 'prihlásiť sa do priestoru' or 'opätovne prihlásiť do priestoru'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'prihlásiť sa do priestoru' or 'opätovne prihlásiť do priestoru' as alternatives to 'znovu zadať prihlasovacie údaje do priestoru'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'aby získali prístup do priestoru' is repeated. This is slightly redundant.  It can be shortened to 'aby sa do priestoru dostali'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'aby získali prístup do priestoru' with 'aby sa do priestoru dostali'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes 'prostora za dostop do prostora'. This is redundant. It means 'space for access to space'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Življenjska doba seje omogoča nastavitev časa (v minutah), preden bodo morali uporabniki {{productName}} znova vnesti poverilnice prostora za dostop.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a hyphenated form of the product name "{{productName}}-а". While technically not incorrect, it's more standard in Serbian to omit the hyphen when referring to users of something. It sounds slightly unnatural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Корисницима {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses a comma before 'pre nego što', which is not standard Serbian punctuation. It should be omitted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Trajanje sesije omogućava postavljanje vremena (u minutima) pre što će korisnicima {{productName}}-a ponovo biti potrebno da unesu pristupne podatke kako bi pristupili prostoru.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “access the space” is translated as “pristupili prostoru”. While accurate, 'ulazak u prostor' might be slightly more natural in this context, suggesting entry.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Trajanje sesije omogućava postavljanje vremena (u minutima) pre što će korisnicima {{productName}}-a ponovo biti potrebno da unesu pristupne podatke kako bi ušli u prostor.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'alan kimlik bilgilerini tekrar girmeleri gerekmeden önce' is a bit lengthy and could be simplified for better readability in Turkish. The phrasing is technically correct but could be more concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Oturum Ömrü, {{productName}} kullanıcılarının alana erişmek için kimlik bilgilerini tekrar girmeleri gerekmeden önce geçen süreyi (dakika bazında) ayarlamanıza olanak sağlar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'enter the space credentials' is not the most natural way to express the meaning in Ukrainian. A more accurate translation would be 'ввести дані для входу в простір' or 'ввести свої облікові дані для доступу до простору'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ввести дані для входу в простір

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Thời gian tồn tại của phiên" (Session Existence Time) is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Session Lifetime." A more appropriate translation would be something like "Thời lượng phiên" or "Thời gian phiên".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Thời lượng phiên

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "thông tin đăng nhập không gian" is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: tài khoản đăng nhập

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of double quotes in the sentence creates an awkward phrasing when combined with the variable {{productName}}. In Vietnamese, it's more natural to ensure that the variable is properly integrated into the sentence flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Thời lượng phiên cho phép đặt thời gian (tính bằng phút) trước khi người dùng {{productName}} cần nhập lại tài khoản đăng nhập để truy cập không gian.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "会话生命周期" (huihua shengmingzhouqi) is a literal translation of 'Session Lifetime' which while understandable, is not the most natural phrasing in Chinese. A more common and user-friendly translation would be something along the lines of '会话时长' (huihua changshi) or '会话有效时间' (huihua youxiao shijian).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using '会话时长' or '会话有效时间' instead of '会话生命周期'.
